quotes.text: We should not give up and we should not allow the problem to defeat us.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: It is no use saying, 'We are doing our best.' You have got to succeed in doing what is necessary.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: I'll prepare and someday my chance will come.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: The one thing that you have that nobody else has is you. Your voice, your mind, your story, your vision. So write and draw and build and play and dance and live as only you can.
quotes.author: Neil Gaiman

quotes.text: Mountains cannot be surmounted except by winding paths.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream; not only plan, but also believe.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: Learning is the beginning of wealth. Learning is the beginning of health. Learning is the beginning of spirituality. Searching and learning is where the miracle process all begins.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: There's power in looking silly and not caring that you do.
quotes.author: Amy Poehler

quotes.text: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you are right.
quotes.author: Henry Ford

quotes.text: I know not age, nor weariness nor defeat.
quotes.author: Rose Kennedy

quotes.text: Motivation is the art of getting people to do what you want them to do because they want to do it.
quotes.author: Dwight D. Eisenhower

quotes.text: One who gains strength by overcoming obstacles possesses the only strength which can overcome adversity.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: The more man meditates upon good thoughts, the better will be his world and the world at large.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: There is nothing impossible to him who will try.
quotes.author: Alexander the Great

quotes.text: Change your life today. Don't gamble on the future, act now, without delay.
quotes.author: Simone de Beauvoir

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: I will prepare and someday my chance will come.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that there was within me an invincible summer.
quotes.author: Albert Camus

quotes.text: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Consult not your fears but your hopes and your dreams. Think not about your frustrations, but about your unfulfilled potential. Concern yourself not with what you tried and failed in, but with what it is still possible for you to do.
quotes.author: Pope John XXIII

quotes.text: The will to win, the desire to succeed, the urge to reach your full potential... these are the keys that will unlock the door to personal excellence.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: I'd rather attempt to do something great and fail than to attempt to do nothing and succeed.
quotes.author: Robert Schuller

quotes.text: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quotes.author: Arthur Ashe

quotes.text: Do the one thing you think you cannot do. Fail at it. Try again. Do better the second time. The only people who never tumble are those who never mount the high wire. This is your moment. Own it.
quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

quotes.text: Do not wait; the time will never be 'just right.' Start where you stand, and work with whatever tools you may have at your command, and better tools will be found as you go along.
quotes.author: George Herbert

quotes.text: Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: Always bear in mind that your own resolution to succeed is more important than any one thing.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Beginning today, treat everyone you meet as if they were going to be dead by midnight. Extend to them all the care, kindness and understanding you can muster, and do it with no thought of any reward. Your life will never be the same again.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: The key is to keep company only with people who uplift you, whose presence calls forth your best.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: In times of change, learners inherit the earth, while the learned find themselves beautifully equipped to deal with a world that no longer exists.
quotes.author: Eric Hoffer

quotes.text: Life is 10% what happens to you and 90% how you react to it.
quotes.author: Chuck Swindoll

quotes.text: Failure will never overtake me if my determination to succeed is strong enough.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: Do the difficult things while they are easy and do the great things while they are small. A journey of a thousand miles must begin with a single step.
quotes.author: Laozi

quotes.text: Learn from yesterday, live for today, hope for tomorrow.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Set your goals high, and don't stop till you get there.
quotes.author: Bo Jackson

quotes.text: Once we accept our limits, we go beyond them.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Knowing is not enough; we must apply!
quotes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe

quotes.text: If you're changing the world, you're working on important things. You're excited to get up in the morning.
quotes.author: Larry Page

quotes.text: There is only one corner of the universe you can be certain of improving, and that's your own self.
quotes.author: Aldous Huxley

quotes.text: The dream was always running ahead of me. To catch up, to live for a moment in unison with it, that was the miracle.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: Accept the challenges so that you can feel the exhilaration of victory.
quotes.author: George S. Patton

quotes.text: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
quotes.author: Harriet Tubman

quotes.text: Be Impeccable with Your Word. Speak with integrity. Say only what you mean. Avoid using the word to speak against yourself or to gossip about others. Use the power of your word in the direction of truth and love.
quotes.author: Don Miguel Ruiz

quotes.text: As you think, so shall you become.
quotes.author: Bruce Lee

quotes.text: By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
quotes.author: Benjamin Franklin

quotes.text: If you can dream it, you can do it.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.text: Quality is not an act; it is a habit.
quotes.author: Aristotle

quotes.text: Without hard work, nothing grows but weeds.
quotes.author: Gordon Hinckley

quotes.text: If you aren't going all the way, why go at all?
quotes.author: Joe Namath

quotes.text: I know where I'm going and I know the truth, and I don't have to be what you want me to be. I'm free to be what I want.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: You are not here merely to make a living. You are here in order to enable the world to live more amply, with greater vision, with a finer spirit of hope and achievement. You are here to enrich the world, and you impoverish yourself if you forget the errand.
quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson

quotes.text: I am not bound to win, but I am bound to be true. I am not bound to succeed, but I am bound to live by the light that I have. I must stand with anybody that stands right, and stand with him while he is right, and part with him when he goes wrong.
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.text: Believe deep down in your heart that you're destined to do great things.
quotes.author: Joe Paterno

quotes.text: Choose a job you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Good, better, best. Never let it rest. ‘Til your good is better and your better is best.
quotes.author: Jerome

quotes.text: Always do your best. What you plant now, you will harvest later.
quotes.author: Og Mandino

quotes.text: Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time.
quotes.author: Thomas Edison

quotes.text: I can, therefore I am.
quotes.author: Simone Weil

quotes.text: Your talent is God's gift to you. What you do with it is your gift back to God.
quotes.author: Leo Buscaglia

quotes.text: All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: Do more than dream: work.
quotes.author: William Arthur Ward

quotes.text: We've got to have a dream if we are going to make a dream come true.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
quotes.author: Carl Sandburg

quotes.text: Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night.
quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

quotes.text: A goal is a dream with a deadline.
quotes.author: Napoleon Hill

quotes.text: The best thing in every noble dream is the dreamer...
quotes.author: Moncure D. Conway

quotes.text: To accomplish great things, we must dream as well as act.
quotes.author: Anatole France

quotes.text: All the great performers I have worked with are fueled by a personal dream.
quotes.author: John Eliot

quotes.text: You can't put a limit on anything. The more you dream, the farther you get.
quotes.author: Michael Phelps

quotes.text: The poor man is not he who is without a cent, but he who is without a dream.
quotes.author: Harry Kemp

quotes.text: Dreams pass into the reality of action. From the actions stems the dream again; and this interdependence produces the highest form of living.
quotes.author: Anaïs Nin

quotes.text: A dream is your creative vision for your life in the future. You must break out of your current comfort zone and become comfortable with the unfamiliar and the unknown.
quotes.author: Denis Waitley

quotes.text: If one advances confidently in the direction of his dream, and endeavors to live the life which he had imagines, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Take up one idea. Make that one idea your life - think of it, dream of it, live on that idea. Let the brain, muscles, nerves, every part of your body, be full of that idea, and just leave every other idea alone. This is the way to success.
quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda

quotes.text: Nothing will work unless you do.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: If one is lucky, a solitary fantasy can totally transform one million realities.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Prejudice is a burden that confuses the past, threatens the future and renders the present inaccessible.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: I love wisdom. And you can never be great at anything unless you love it. Not be in love with it, but love the thing, admire the thing. And it seems that if you love the thing, and you don't just want to possess it, it will find you.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: We may encounter many defeats, but we must not be defeated.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: All great achievements require time.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: I believe that every person is born with talent.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: When you learn, teach. When you get, give.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
quotes.author: Maya Angelou

quotes.text: Only I can change my life. No one can do it for me.
quotes.author: Carol Burnett

quotes.text: Believe in yourself! Have faith in your abilities! Without a humble but reasonable confidence in your own powers you cannot be successful or happy.
quotes.author: Norman Vincent Peale

quotes.text: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: If you're going through hell, keep going.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: Do something wonderful, people may imitate it.
quotes.author: Albert Schweitzer

quotes.text: Let us sacrifice our today so that our children can have a better tomorrow.
quotes.author: A. P. J. Abdul Kalam

quotes.text: I think people who are creative are the luckiest people on earth. I know that there are no shortcuts, but you must keep your faith in something Greater than you and keep doing what you love. Do what you love, and you will find the way to get it out to the world.
quotes.author: Judy Collins

quotes.text: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it.
quotes.author: Lou Holtz

quotes.text: Difficulties are meant to rouse, not discourage. The human spirit is to grow strong by conflict.
quotes.author: William Ellery Channing

quotes.text: If you want to succeed you should strike out on new paths, rather than travel the worn paths of accepted success.
quotes.author: John Locke

quotes.text: Look up at the stars and not down at your feet. Try to make sense of what you see, and wonder about what makes the universe exist. Be curious.
quotes.author: Stephen Hawking

quotes.text: When you reach the end of your rope, tie a knot in it and hang on.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: You can't cross the sea merely by standing and staring at the water.
quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

quotes.text: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The biggest room in the world is room for improvement.
quotes.author: Helmut Schmidt

quotes.text: Some of the greater things in life are unseen; that's why you close your eyes when you kiss, cry, or dream.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: You must either modify your dreams or magnify your skills.
quotes.author: Jim Rohn

quotes.text: Life has more imagination than we carry in our dreams.
quotes.author: Christopher Columbus

quotes.text: Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.
quotes.author: Kahlil Gibran

quotes.text: Dreams do come true, if we only wish hard enough, You can have anything in life if you will sacrifice everything else for it.
quotes.author: James Matthew Barrie

quotes.text: Walking with a friend in the dark is better than walking alone in the light.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: We could never learn to be brave and patient if there were only joy in the world.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen, nor touched... but are felt in the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: The most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched. They must be felt with the heart.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world right in the eye.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: No pessimist ever discovered the secrets of the stars, or sailed to an uncharted land, or opened a new heaven to the human spirit.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Keep yourself to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadow.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Face your deficiencies and acknowledge them; but do not let them master you. Let them teach you patience, sweetness, insight.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Character cannot be developed in ease and quiet. Only through experience of trial and suffering can the soul be strengthened, vision cleared, ambition inspired, and success achieved.
quotes.author: Helen Keller
